shortdesc.i: This member method will delete the notification from the UIB notifications area automatically. UIB notifications will also be removed manually if the user clicks it.

example.title: Example:
example.pre:
<script type="text/javascript">

    var n = new Notification("You have a simple notification");

    // Automatically close the notification after an hour
    setTimeout("n.close()", 1000 * 60 * 60);

</script>
